page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN KEMPSTON
page.content: Kempston is in an area which has a variety of{new industries;}in 1985 augmented by the still-expanding {Woburn Rd.Industrial Estate.}Nearby {Bedford}provides many{service}and {manufacturing}jobs.Our{survey}of heads of household showed that 20% worked in Kempston itself,34% in Bedford and a further 28.8% in the county.The County Police Headquarters was the{main local {employer}at 21%. 16% were employed in service industries and 8% in farming, leaving the remaining 55% working in manufacturing industries within Kempston.Most(55%)had been in same job for more than 5 years.Job descriptions included engineer,baker,police officer pigman,removals,sales assistant,paint sprayer and director.{62.8% travelled {to work by car,}14% by bicycle and 9% walked.The bus was only used by 4.2%. No-one was currently out of work.
